title: Administration Analysis
subtitle: Deep dive into procurement patterns across Mexican presidential administrations (2002–2025)
groundTruthNote: Known corruption cases documented in this period are tracked in the Ground Truth section, including vendor matches, contract counts, and detection rates for each case.
documentedCasesNote: Manually verified from public records and ASF investigations — not ML-detected
noData: No yearly data available for this administration
noEvents: No events recorded for this period
incompleteDatasetDescription: Sheinbaum's administration began October 2024. This data covers ~4 months vs. 6-year full terms for other presidents. Direct comparisons may be misleading.
sectorCorrelationsNote: Sector pairs with correlated risk trajectories (|r| ≥ 0.70) during this administration
